de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.chiffre
Class BigIntegerUtils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--de.tubs.cs.iti.krypto.chiffre.BigIntegerUtils
public class BigIntegerUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides some special methods for BigInteger arithmetic that are useful for certain cryptographic algorithms.

public static final boolean odd(java.math.BigInteger val)
Returns whether the specified BigInteger is odd.

Parameters:
val - a BigInteger.
Returns:
true if the BigInteger is odd, ie. not a multiple of 2.

Create a random number x with 0 <= x < max

Parameters:

Returns:

rnd_between

public static java.math.BigInteger rnd_between(java.math.BigInteger min,
                                               java.math.BigInteger max)
Create a random number x with min <= x < max

Parameters:
min - a BigInteger
max - a BigInteger
Returns:
a random BigInteger that is bigger than or equal to min and smaller than max.
See Also:
rnd_smaller_than(java.math.BigInteger)
